objects.text:
• Premium rose gold plating with
   delicate crystal elements
• Four-leaf clover pendant and
   connected heart design
• Adjustable chain length for
   versatile styling

product_details.name: Elegant Rose Gold Heart Collection - Dual Layer Necklace Set
product_details.description:
• Premium rose gold plated design with delicate chain construction
• Dual-layer necklace featuring a four-leaf clover pendant and connected hearts
• Embellished with sparkling crystal elements for luxurious shine
• Adjustable chain length for versatile styling options
• Perfect combination of romantic hearts and lucky clover motifs
• Ideal for layering or wearing separately
• High-quality craftsmanship with intricate filigree details
• Suitable for both casual and formal occasions
• Makes a perfect gift for special occasions
• Hypoallergenic and skin-friendly materials

banner_details:
The banner features a sophisticated split background with a soft gradient—subtly transitioning from a warm blush pink on the right to a muted rose shade on the left. Anchoring the design is a centered jewelry display of a dual-layer necklace set, incorporating a four-leaf clover pendant and heart motifs on the right side. Text elements, including a bold attention-grabbing title (`heading`), an elegant subtitle (`subheading`), and a neatly-stacked features list (`description`), are aligned to the left. A prominent price section (`price`) and a bold rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) encourage purchase. Light decorative circles and minimal typography (`tagline`) emphasize elegance and gift-worthiness.

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Blush: `#F9D6D6`
- Soft Pink: `#FFE4E4`
- Rose Gold Accent: `#D65A5A`
- Deep Chestnut Text: `#8D4E4E`
- Warm Brown Text: `#6D3F3F`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a delicate rose gold necklace with heart-shaped pendants that join to form a four-leaf clover design. The color palette is soft, feminine, and luxurious, ideal for a romantic and elegant advertisement banner. The primary color is rose gold (#B76E79), used in the chain and outlines of the hearts, giving a warm and inviting tone. Accents of diamond-like white (#FFFFFF) with soft silver (#D0D0D0) add sparkle and contrast, enhancing the jewelry's brilliance. These colors blend seamlessly, with rose gold enveloping and highlighting the inner shimmer, creating a harmonious and eye-catching visual appeal.
